desc: Cost-effective solution to expensive glue on brass downspout nozzles. Downspout nozzles are used as a parapet overflow nozzle or at the base of a wall to divert water away from the building to protect the foundation. The wall flange covers the rough opening around the nozzle. Also called cows tongue.

layout.text:
A Cost-Efficient Solution
to End Metal Theft.

Brass downspout nozzles have become a popular
target for metal thieves. You can easily deter
thieves by placing our plastic downspout nozzles
